title: Senior Digital Marketing Associate
job_overview:
Join Us as a Senior Digital Marketing Associate!

???? Are You the Right Fit? ????
Do you thrive on crafting and discussing digital strategies that deliver real results?
Are you passionate about leading client relationships and growing their business?
Do you dream of working with a world-class team to create impactful marketing campaigns?
If your answer is "yes" to all of the above, then this role might be your perfect match. At JMarketing, we’re looking for a talented Senior Marketing Account Manager to join our award-winning team. Read on to find out more!

About the Role
Job Title: Senior Digital Marketing Associate (Remote)
Salary Range: USD per month
Hours of Work: 40 hours per week
Employment Type: Permanent, Full-time

DO NOT APPLY if you have not worked in a senior position within an advertising agency before. We are only looking for already highly experienced marketers with exceptional communication skills, who make marketing easy to understand for our clients.


As a Senior Digital Marketing Associate, you will:
1. Be the main point of contact for our clients, building strong, trust-based relationships.
2. Develop tailored marketing strategies to help clients achieve their goals.
3.Work alongside a Marketing Execution Specialist to implement campaigns seamlessly.
4.Analyze campaign performance and provide actionable insights.
5.Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell services, driving business growth.
Partner with award-winning designers and content creators to bring strategies to life.

What Makes This Role Unique?
-Work directly with experienced directors who are marketing experts with over 20 years of hands-on experience.
-Collaborate with a team that produces multi-award-winning landing pages and websites.
-Focus on high-impact strategies in diverse industries and global markets.
-Be part of an agency that values innovation, learning, and collaboration.

About Us
JMarketing is an award-winning digital marketing agency operating in 16 countries. We specialize in high-performing strategies driven by consumer psychology. Our team is committed to creating campaigns that stand out, delivering exceptional results for our clients.

What We’re Looking For
-Marketing Expertise: Proven experience in digital marketing, including Google Ads and SEO.
-Relationship Builder: Exceptional communication skills and the ability to make complex ideas simple.
-Data-Driven Thinker: A knack for analyzing performance metrics and translating them into action.
-Strategic Visionary: Familiarity with tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, or Ahrefs.
-Sales-Driven Approach: Skilled in identifying opportunities to grow client accounts.

Key Responsibilities
-Manage client relationships and act as their trusted advisor.
-Lead strategic planning and oversee campaign execution.
-Analyze campaign data to refine strategies and achieve performance goals.
-Collaborate with internal teams to ensure campaigns are effective and aligned with client objectives.
-Drive revenue growth through upselling and cross-selling opportunities.

What You Bring
5+ years of experience in digital marketing strategy or account management, ideally in an agency setting.
A bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
Hands-on expertise in managing Google Ads and SEO campaigns.
A track record of success in B2B or complex sales cycles.

How to Apply
Write a short cover letter (max 100 words) explaining why this role excites you and how your experience makes you a great fit. Start your application by mentioning the last book you read—applications missing this step will not be considered.
Shortlisted candidates will complete a personality assessment and meet our Directors and Team, for a final interview.

We’re excited to see what you’ll bring to our team at JMarketing. Let’s create something incredible together!
